register.reg_long_name: Hypervisor Debug Fine-Grained Read Trap Register 2

purpose_text.para: Provides controls for traps of MRS and MRC reads of debug, trace, PMU, and Statistical Profiling System registers.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of TRBMPAM_EL1 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads of TRBMPAM_EL1 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of TRBMPAM_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of TRCITECR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of TRCITECR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of TRCITECR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMSDSFR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of PMSDSFR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of PMSDSFR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of SPMDEVAFF_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of SPMDEVAFF_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of SPMDEVAFF_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of SPMSCR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of SPMSCR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of SPMSCR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of SPMACCESSR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of SPMACCESSR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of SPMACCESSR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of SPMCR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads of SPMCR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of SPMCR_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of SPMSELR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads of SPMSELR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of SPMSELR_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
Regardless of the value of this field, if event counter n is not implemented, a read of SPMEVTYPER<n>_EL0, SPMEVFILTR<n>_EL0, or SPMEVFILT2R<n>_EL0 is UNDEFINED.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2: SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0.
Regardless of the value of this field, if event counter n is not implemented, a read of SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 is UNDEFINED.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMSSCR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of PMSSCR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of PMSSCR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MRS reads at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of MDSELR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

It is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED whether this field is implemented or is RES0 when 16 or fewer breakpoints are implemented, 16 or fewer watchpoints are implemented, and MDSELR_EL1 is implemented as RAZ/WI.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of MDSELR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of MDSELR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMUACR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of PMUACR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of PMUACR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMICFILTR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then:

listitem.content: MRS reads of PMICFILTR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
PMCNTENCLR_EL0.F0, PMCNTENSET_EL0.F0, PMOVSCLR_EL0.F0, and PMOVSSET_EL0.F0 read as zero at EL1 and EL0.
PMINTENCLR_EL1.F0 and PMINTENSET_EL1.F0 read as zero at EL1.

field_value_description.para: MRS reads of PMICFILTR_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMICNTR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, then MRS reads of PMICNTR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of PMICNTR_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMIAR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of PMIAR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of PMIAR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MRS reads of PMECR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when all of the following are true:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, then MRS reads of PMECR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the read generates a higher priority exception.
MRS reads of PMECR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_EBEP is implemented or FEAT_PMUv3_SS is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
